column4: After a failed update to 11.10 which made my system unable to boot properly, I'm trying to do a fresh install of 11.10, but it keeps stopping mid installation after spewing out a lot of starting/stopping messages. Can anyone help with that?
are you sure that you can not get data back ?
i dont care about the data
that is allways the 1st step that I take
umm... so you have virtual box ?
I'm currently putting the iso on the usb stick again, maybe it went wrong there

reput it on the sd card, still does not work. I get to the install/livecd/memtest screen, choose install on hdd, then it shows the loading screen for a good minute, then a lot of starting/stopping stuff, with one fail: Starting restore sound card(s') mixer state(s) [fail]
no touch is all right over here
everything was fine over here too, until it crashed during update
what are you using to put on perstiant usb ?
cool just making sure of that. umm.. DL new image
I'm not sure what you're doing. A new iso is not working. Sorry if I sound impatient.
there are other that can help you
